hadith.text: Abu Musa said :I asked the prophet (ﷺ) about wine made from honey. He said: That is bit. I said: And the one made from barley and millet ? He said :That is mizr. He then said: Tell your people that every intoxicant is prohibited

grades.name: Zubair Ali Zai
grades.grade: Isnaad Sahih Sahih Bukhari (6124، 4344) Sahih Muslim (1733 After  2001)
